definition: to provide relief during times of emergency and disaster (idiom)
to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch

sentences.english: People's policemen shall take an active part in rescue and relief work as well as in social welfare services.
sentences.chinese: 人民警察應當積極參加搶險救災和社會公益工作。

sentences.english: Their primary task facing was in the southwest of rescue and relief.
sentences.chinese: 他們首要面臨的任務便是西南地區的搶險救災。
